header.tagline: Senior Estimator & Architect – Infrastructure & Civil Projects

summary: Experienced in infrastructure projects, generating $60M+ in cost estimates through precise BOQs.

bullets.text: Conducted detailed analysis of tendering documents, ensuring all project specifications aligned with client requirements, leading to successful project bids.
Executed First Principle Estimating for diverse civil projects, including foundations and architectural elements, enhancing accuracy of initial project budgets.
Prepared comprehensive Bill of Quantities (BOQ) and detailed tender documents, improving bid success by 30% through precise cost estimation.
Delivered quantity take-off for complex civil projects across various sectors, including healthcare and education, optimizing resource allocation and cost efficiency.
Developed cost estimates and assessments of design variations, ensuring project budget adherence and minimizing cost overruns.
Managed projects' progress with budget adjustments through precise analysis and project oversight, achieving budgetary goals.
Secured major project approvals and regularizations, optimizing project lifecycle management in compliance with industry norms.
Led tender assessments and preliminary budgeting, providing insights to Tender Opening Committees on optimized resource management.
Formulated precise Bill of Quantities (BOQ), encompassing material and labor costs, enhancing project deliverables and fiscal predictability.
Drove cost estimation and consultancy in collaboration with suppliers, achieving competitive pricing structures for high-value projects.
Developed scope clarification proposals with contractors, aligning construction methods with economic goals to bolster budget adherence.
Directed critical projects such as South Morang Terminal Station, effectively managing costs of complex infrastructure components, valued at $3.5M.
Optimized cost structures for infrastructure and civil drawings, enhancing contractor engagements and agreement validations.
Monitored and adjusted budgets in real-time, aligning project executions with financial forecasts, reducing cost discrepancies by 14%.
Performed intimate analysis of tendering documents, extracting key information to optimize bidding accuracy, securing projects with up to $12.0M valuation.
Executed detailed quantity take-offs and cost estimates, refining project financial baselines to enhance competitive tender submissions.
Managed cost estimating operations, ensuring comprehensive supplier and subcontractor alignment with project budgets.
Assisted in dispute resolutions with clients, fostering clear communication and alignment in project expectations and deliverables.
Streamlined preparation of detailed BOQs for luxury residential and hotel projects, enhancing proposal win rates through detailed fiscal planning.
Conducted comprehensive quantity take-offs, enhancing financial accuracy for high-rise residential projects totalling $4.0M.
Prepared Bill of Quantities (BOQ) and cost estimates, leading to improved financial proposals for land purchase feasibility.
Developed rigorous cost analyses and financing documentation, optimizing procurement processes for project advancement.
Executed feasibility cost studies for logistics warehouse projects, significantly enhancing early-stage budgeting accuracy.
Calculated comprehensive project costs, overseeing budgeting and BOQ preparations to ensure financial viability in design phases.
Managed cost evaluations for architectural projects, aligning financial outlines with client objectives during preliminary designs.
Monitored on-site project activities, enhancing cost estimation accuracy and compliance in complex healthcare construction environments, valued at $9.6M.
Enhanced project planning by assessing and estimating design variation costs, facilitating budget alignment.
Streamlined tender project analyses, providing essential insights for cost-efficient material procurement and contract negotiations.
Addressed cost variances proactively during construction, employing project management strategies to ensure budget fidelity.

additionalExperience: Member of AIQS since December 2023; Certified in Autodesk Revit Architecture, MEP, Navisworks.
